My son needed a shirt to match his girlfriends dress for winter formal. He originally wanted a plain black shirt, but I searched for black and purple shirts, on the off chance I may find something. As soon as I saw this shirt I knew this was just what my son needed.  I ordered this in a small, as my son is 5'8" and 135lbs. It did fit him ok, but for me it seems to be a little on the small size for a man's shirt.  The fabric is nice and this item is well made. The black and purple go so well together. I gave this shirt 5 stars as it really is a great looking piece of clothing. It is something you can dress up with a nice pair of trousers, or dress it down with a pair of jeans. This is a must for any man's closet.  I highly recommend this product.

Further described as "【Premium Material】Soft breathable cotton fabric that is skin-friendly and comfortable to touch,non-shrink, non-deformed,no pilling or fade, suitable for all seasons of spring, summer, autumn and winter."  The shirt is 80% polyester and 20% Elastane—no cotton, which I prefer precisely because of its breathability and skin-friendly qualities.

I bought this as a gift for my husband. He pointed out that the color on the cuffs is very hard to style in the same way as the photos, since you can't roll the cuffs and still see the color. You have to just kind of jam the sleeves up past your elbows, which is less comfortable. Alternatively, the cuffs need to be larger so they can be buttoned up around the elbows and held in place more securely.  The shirt is also not cotton at all, it's a stretchy, rayon/nylon feel, which was unexpected, but much lighter weight than a cotton shirt, which actually worked out well for our hot climate.

评论概述: Materials not as they seem nor specified
评论详情: There is literally ZERO cotton in this shirt (even though the ad states otherwise); It is only 20% polyester and 80% Elastic/Elastane. The shirt is incredibly thin and lifeless, possibly even see through if it weren’t black. It has no structural integrity or body of its own, thus, requiring the wearer to form out the shirt instead of the other way around.  Might be the worst shirt I’ve ever purchased from Amazon yet.

What I got that I didnt want, is all the loose threads. Buttons, seams, cuff, collar, all have threads coming out of them. These shirts will probably start to come apart eventually. Besides that , they are nice enough, and comfortable enough. They do have double buttons so it takes longer to put on but it kind of looks nice.
